heading: 1. What options are there for paying?
content: On the website, we currently accept cards as well as cash on delivery.

heading: 2. How do i find out if my order has been accepted?
content: Order confirmation will be issued through email or text message.

heading: 3. How can i get my order's invoice?
content: The purchase invoice will be delivered by email or text message.

heading: 4. In how many days will the order be delivered at home?
content: Typically, your order will be delivered in 4-5 working days.

heading: 5. How do i reach customer service?
content: Please contact us via WhatsApp at +974 5070 4018 with any questions, comments, or complaints.
